content:
Here are more beautiful Korean names for a baby girl, along with their Hanja representations and meanings:

1. 은비 (Eun-bi) – 은은할 (graceful) + 아름다울 (beautiful) - 恩美
2. 지아 (Ji-a) – 지혜로운 (wise) + 아름다울 (beautiful) - 智雅
3. 서린 (Seo-rin) – 서옥 (gem) + 린 (forest) - 瑞林
4. 유진 (Yu-jin) – 유연할 (gentle) + 진주 (pearl) - 柔珍
5. 가은 (Ga-eun) – 가 (song) + 은혜 (grace) - 歌恩
6. 미소 (Mi-so) – 미인 (beauty) + 웃음 (smile) - 美笑
7. 예원 (Ye-won) – 예쁠 (beautiful) + 원효 (circle or source) - 麗媛
8. 청하 (Cheong-ha) – 청명할 (clear) + 하늘 (sky) - 淸하
9. 주아 (Ju-a) – 주옥 (gem) + 아름다울 (beautiful) - 珠雅
10. 현아 (Hyeon-a) – 현명할 (wise) + 아름다울 (beautiful) - 賢娥

Please keep in mind that the Hanja provided may not be the only possible representation for each name, as different Hanja characters can have the same pronunciation in Korean. The meanings can also vary slightly depending on the specific Hanja characters used.
